member.name: M:ArtemisProjectile.Projectile.CalculateTrajectory(UnityEngine.Vector3,UnityEngine.Vector3,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Int32)
member.summary: Calculates the path a projectile will travel in 1 fixed time step.
member.param: The current position of the projectile.
The current velocity of the projectile.
The maximum thickness the projectile can penetrate in mm. (inclusive)
The value by which Physics.gravity is multiplied.
The maximum angle at which a ricochet can occur. (inclusive)
The layer mask the projectile uses to filter collisions.
